description.zh: Amazon 托管的大规模公开数据集，包括卫星图像、基因组、气候等 PB 级数据
description.en: Amazon-hosted large-scale public datasets including satellite imagery, genomics, climate data at PB scale

authority_justification.zh: AWS 官方维护，与 NASA、NOAA、NIH 等机构合作，提供免费云端访问
authority_justification.en: Officially maintained by AWS, partnered with NASA, NOAA, NIH, provides free cloud access
